## Security Benefits

### ğŸ”’ No Long-Lived Secrets
- Traditional: Service principal password stored in GitHub (valid for months/years)
- OIDC: Short-lived token (valid for 10-15 minutes, workflow duration only)

### ğŸ¯ Scoped Access
- **Repository**: Only `fjgomariz/fd-fb-apim`
- **Environment**: Only `dev` (not staging, prod, or no environment)
- **Resources**: Only `rg-sample-privapp-weu` resource group
- **Forks**: Cannot use credentials (subject won't match)

### ğŸ“ Auditable
All actions logged in Azure Activity Log:
```
Caller: sp-github-fd-fb-apim-dev
Action: Microsoft.Resources/deployments/write
Resource: rg-sample-privapp-weu
Timestamp: 2024-01-14T13:30:00Z
```

### ğŸ”„ Automatic Rotation
No manual credential rotation needed - each workflow run gets a fresh token.

## Subject Format Explained

```
repo:fjgomariz/fd-fb-apim:environment:dev
â”‚    â”‚         â”‚           â”‚            â”‚
â”‚    â”‚         â”‚           â”‚            â””â”€ Environment name
â”‚    â”‚         â”‚           â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Literal "environment:"
â”‚    â”‚         â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Repository name
â”‚    â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Organization/owner
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Literal "repo:"
```

This means credentials work ONLY when:
- âœ… Workflow runs in repository `fjgomariz/fd-fb-apim`
- âœ… Job uses environment `dev`
- âŒ Pull request from fork (different repository)
- âŒ Workflow without environment context
- âŒ Different environment (staging, prod)

## Multiple Environments Example

```
Setup Script Runs:
â”œâ”€ dev     â†’ sp-github-fd-fb-apim-dev     â†’ rg-sample-privapp-dev
â”œâ”€ staging â†’ sp-github-fd-fb-apim-staging â†’ rg-sample-privapp-staging
â””â”€ prod    â†’ sp-github-fd-fb-apim-prod    â†’ rg-sample-privapp-prod

Each with unique subject:
â”œâ”€ repo:fjgomariz/fd-fb-apim:environment:dev
â”œâ”€ repo:fjgomariz/fd-fb-apim:environment:staging
â””â”€ repo:fjgomariz/fd-fb-apim:environment:prod

Same GitHub secrets (differentiated by environment context)
```
